Text:
There are several ways to achieve what you want. Here are two examples: **Using `display: inline-block;`** .player { margin: 10px; border: 1px solid red; padding: 10px; text-align: center; display: inline-block; }

Username - Level

Username - Level

**Using `display: flex;`** .players { display: flex; } .player { margin: 10px; border: 1px solid red; padding: 10px; text-align: center; }

Username - Level

Username - Level

Both solutions need you to wrap your elements inside a wrapping `div`.
